## Source: amazon-inspector (5c63e27e2c86203c152f6f7bfc30136a44d93bfbc84522fcf86ca97976511a59)
The package @qualys/react-web was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (c34121468e92fda61a11befd4ca6253a635ae9470b89c6ccf4e155c32e9ebc1b)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified '@qualys/react-web' @ 5.4.3-2 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
